spells.name: Alter Self
spells.description: Assume form of a Small or Medium humanoid.

spells.name: Animal Messenger
spells.description: Sends a Tiny animal to a specific place.

spells.name: Animal Trance
spells.description: Fascinates 2d6 HD of animals.

spells.name: Blindness/Deafness
spells.description: Makes subject blind or deaf.

spells.name: Blur
spells.description: Attacks miss subject 20% of the time.

spells.name: Calm Emotions
spells.description: Calms creatures, negating emotion effects.

spells.name: Cat's Grace
spells.description: Subject gains +4 to Dex for 1 min./level.

spells.name: Cure Moderate Wounds
spells.description: Cures 2d8 damage + 1/level (max +10).

spells.name: Darkness
spells.description: 20-ft. radius of supernatural shadow.

spells.name: Daze Monster
spells.description: Living creature of 6 HD or less loses next action.

spells.name: Delay Poison
spells.description: Stops poison from harming target for 1 hour/level.

spells.name: Detect Thoughts
spells.description: Allows “listening” to surface thoughts.

spells.name: Eagle's Splendor
spells.description: Subject gains +4 to Cha for 1 min./level.

spells.name: Enthrall
spells.description: Captivates all within 100 ft. + 10 ft./level.

spells.name: Fox's Cunning
spells.description: Subject gains +4 to Int for 1 min./level.

spells.name: Glitterdust
spells.description: Blinds creatures, outlines invisible creatures.

spells.name: Heroism
spells.description: Gives +2 on attack rolls, saves, skill checks.

spells.name: Hold Person
spells.description: Paralyzes one humanoid for 1 round/level.

spells.name: Hypnotic Pattern
spells.description: Fascinates (2d4 + level) HD of creatures.

spells.name: Invisibility
spells.description: Subject is invisible for 1 min./level or until it attacks.

spells.name: Locate Object
spells.description: Senses direction toward object (specific or type).

spells.name: Minor Image
spells.description: As silent image, plus some sound.

spells.name: Mirror Image
spells.description: Creates decoy duplicates of you (1d4 + 1 per three levels, max 8).

spells.name: Misdirection
spells.description: Misleads divinations for one creature or object.

spells.name: Pyrotechnics
spells.description: Turns fire into blinding light or choking smoke.

spells.name: Rage
spells.description: Gives +2 to Str and Con, +1 on Will saves, –2 to AC.

spells.name: Scare
spells.description: Panics creatures of less than 6 HD.

spells.name: Shatter
spells.description: Sonic vibration damages objects or crystalline creatures.

spells.name: Silence
spells.description: Negates sound in 20-ft. radius.

spells.name: Sound Burst
spells.description: Deals 1d8 sonic damage and may stun subjects.

spells.name: Suggestion
spells.description: Compels subject to follow stated course of action.

spells.name: Summon Monster II
spells.description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

spells.name: Summon Swarm
spells.description: Summons swarm of bats, rats, or spiders.

spells.name: Tongues
spells.description: Speak and understand any language.

spells.name: Whispering Wind
spells.description: Sends a short message 1 mile/level.
